forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. South southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. North northeast wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 82. East southeast wind 3 to 8 mph.
